name: Match Spin Go!
description:
Do you feel like you have lost your path? And, no matter what you do, every little thing piles ups and breaks all around? 

Well then, this is your time to shine since cracking Tiles is what you will need to do to arrange the Path-Slates in an ordered fashion, allowing Beige, a peculiar young lad from way out of town, to traverse the road to its final goal: a real-life spaceship.

ET must go home!  Only you can make the difference.

To aid the nice little alien fellow, you will need to Click or Tap a Tile adjacent to (at least) one other of the same color to destroy them. All the Path-Slates of the corresponding colors to the recently destroyed Tiles will rotate. When two Paths are aligned, the character will move from one Slate to the next.

Stay vigilant; if the Big & Mean tank reaches the top, it is Game-Over.

This prototype was made for the Kenny Jam 2021by the awesome Javier & Joaquínwhile carrying me. (who could blame them, I'm adorable)
